message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. Could we possibly come to an agreement within this range?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $18,000 is my bottom line.  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be a valuable asset for you.
